changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE sim_details( id BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, phone_number VARCHAR(100) not null, branch_id BIGINT, total_balance BIGINT, daily_balance BIGINT, monthly_balance BIGINT, notes varchar(500), status_id BIGINT, customer_id BIGINT, FOREIGN KEY(branch_id) REFERENCES branch(id), FOREIGN KEY(status_id) REFERENCES status(id), FOREIGN KEY(customer_id) REFERENCES customer(id) );
